decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using low-cost creatures and control spells in a mono blue color scheme. The deck aims to quickly get creatures onto the battlefield, disrupt the opponent's game plan with counterspells, and maintain card advantage through card draw and manipulation. By efficiently deploying threats and protecting them with counterspells, the deck seeks to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent to secure a victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing low-cost creatures and countermagic to control the board while constantly applying pressure to the opponent. By utilizing efficient creatures like Faerie Seer and Brinebarrow Intruder, combined with disruptive spells like Counterspell and Spellstutter Sprite, this deck aims to establish an early advantage and maintain it throughout the game. The inclusion of cards like Of One Mind and Ninja of the Deep Hours allows for card advantage and additional threats to be generated, while finishing off opponents with Illvoi Galeblade or overwhelming them with multiple creatures.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. By utilizing a combination of low-cost creatures and targeted removal, the deck aims to control the battlefield and apply constant pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Cleansing Wildfire and Nihil Spellbomb also provides some disruption against opposing strategies. Additionally, the deck features recursion and card advantage through cards such as Pulse of Murasa and Ichor Wellspring to maintain a steady stream of threats.

This Pauper Jund deck focuses on aggressive gameplay by utilizing sacrifice effects and efficient removal spells to control the board while maintaining card advantage through sacrificing artifacts. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a mix of creatures, artifacts, and burn spells, ultimately seeking to outvalue the opponent and close out the game quickly. The inclusion of various sacrifice outlets and recursion cards allows for flexibility in the deck's strategy, making it a versatile and resilient aggro archetype.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Golgari/Jund colors to control the board through removal spells and disruption, while also generating card advantage with cards like Ichor Wellspring and Pulse of Murasa. The deck includes ways to recur key creatures like Thorn of the Black Rose and Crypt Rats, as well as ways to gain life and stabilize with Lembas and Reckoner's Bargain. The main win condition is to overwhelm the opponent with incremental advantage and value creatures like Troll of Khazad-dûm while maintaining control over the game.

The deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana by casting multiple High Tides in a turn and untapping lands with cards like Hidden Strings and Psychic Puppetry. The goal is to combo off and draw cards with Ideas Unbound, Peer Through Depths, and Lórien Revealed while utilizing cards like Brainstorm and Preordain to find combo pieces. The deck aims to cast big spells like Behold the Multiverse and Stream of Thought to draw more cards and eventually win the game by overwhelming the opponent with a massive amount of resources.

This Pauper Jund Aggro deck focuses on creating tokens, sacrificing them for value, and disrupting the opponent's game plan. It uses Krark-Clan Shaman and Gixian Infiltrator alongside cards like Writhing Chrysalis and Fanatical Offering to generate tokens and gain advantages. The deck also includes removal spells like Cast Down and Cleansing Wildfire to control the board. Additionally, the deck has graveyard hate with Nihil Spellbomb and Crypt Incursion to disrupt strategies relying on the graveyard. Pulse of Murasa and Makeshift Munitions provide flexibility and additional win conditions.

The focus of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to maintain control with a low-cost spell package while quickly deploying threats that can pressure the opponent. The deck contains efficient card draw and disruption spells to help maintain tempo and protect its threats. The inclusion of Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent provides early-game pressure, while Tolarian Terror and Lórien Revealed can finish off the opponent once the board is stabilized. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its aggressive creatures and disruptive spell suite.

The main focus of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to quickly and efficiently control the board through countering spells and disrupting opponents, while also applying pressure with evasive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent. The deck utilizes card draw spells like Deep Analysis and Brainstorm to maintain card advantage and fuel its aggressive strategy. By combining disruption with efficient creatures, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victories through a combination of tempo and aggression.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by utilizing a combination of removal spells, hand disruption, and card draw. The deck focuses on utilizing Golgari and Jund cards to control the board and outvalue the opponent. It also aims to generate value by sacrificing creatures and using graveyard recursion effects such as Pulse of Murasa and Lembas. The deck aims to maintain board presence with tokens from Khalni Garden and Tithing Blade, while using cards like defile and Crypt Rats to deal with opposing threats.

The deck focuses on utilizing fog effects to prevent opponent's creatures from attacking effectively while comboing off with various card draw and mana ramp cards to achieve victory. The key strategy is to stall the game with fogs and control elements until the combo pieces can be assembled to win the game. The combination of fog effects and card draw engines ensure that the deck can outlast opponents and set up for a powerful finish utilizing the combo pieces.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive red creatures and spells. By utilizing efficient cards like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast for removal, along with powerful creatures like Goblin Bushwhacker and Voldaren Epicure, the goal is to quickly chip away at the opponent's life total. Additionally, cards like Rally at the Hornburg and Burning-Tree Emissary provide extra value and potential for explosive turns. The deck is designed to apply constant pressure and push for a fast victory.

The main focus of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with early aggression while disrupting their game plan with counterspells and bounce effects. By using cheap and efficient creatures like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent, along with card selection spells like Brainstorm and Ponder, the deck aims to maintain tempo and pressure. Lórien Revealed and Deem Inferior offer additional card advantage, while Sleep of the Dead can provide a crucial turn of reprieve. With a focus on efficiency and disruption, this deck aims to win quickly and decisively.

This Dimir Control deck focuses on card advantage and disruption to control the game, utilizing spells like Mystical Teachings and Counterspell to outvalue the opponent. It also includes removal spells like Cast Down and Innocent Blood to deal with threats, while incorporating some graveyard hate with cards like Bojuka Bog and Crypt Incursion. The deck aims to grind out the opponent with efficient card draw and removal, while holding up counterspells to protect its game plan. It seeks to outlast the opponent and win through attrition.

The main focus of this Jund aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a mix of creatures and spells that disrupt and destroy their resources. By combining powerful cards like Cast Down and Krark-Clan Shaman with artifacts like Drossforge Bridge and Ichor Wellspring, the deck aims to quickly build up a strong board presence while also denying the opponent of their key cards. With a mix of removal, card draw, and sacrifice effects, this deck puts pressure on the opponent from multiple angles and can quickly turn the tide in its favor.

This deck focuses on flooding the board with aggressive creatures and utilizing sacrifice effects to gain value and disrupt opponents. It combines tokens from cards like Ichor Wellspring and Writhing Chrysalis with removal spells like Cast Down and Cleansing Wildfire to control the battlefield. The presence of artifacts like Drossforge Bridge and Nihil Spellbomb provide additional synergy with sacrifice effects, while cards like Fanatical Offering and Makeshift Munitions amp up the aggression. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of creature pressure and disruption.
